Data assumptions:
One of:
Fossil Specimen
Human observation
Living specimen
Machine observation
Preserved specimen
Occurence
Material Sample

Notes or processing instructions: Must include a back reference to the taxonworks Collection/Source object
The roles array is a collection of Roles objects, each of which contains a reference to a Person and the type of role they play.
This should in theory be the same as the collector field
This field doesn’t make sense in relation to Observations, but may be added as a DataAttribute if present
No dedicated not field, but can use a Note object attached to the AssertedDistribution
